name: Hilmi Razib Yusuf
headline: Fullstack Developer
bio1: Innovative Fullstack Developer with 3+ years of experience designing and developing scalable web applications. Skilled in frontend and backend development with expertise in Vue.js, Nuxt.js, React, Next.js, Node.js, and Laravel. Proficient in databases such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB, with strong knowledge of RESTful APIs and system integrations.
bio2: Proven track record in delivering HRIS systems, internal company tools, and SEO-optimized company profile websites. Adept at Agile practices (Scrum & Kanban), collaborating across teams, and ensuring application performance, responsiveness, and maintainability through clean architecture, reusable components, and clear documentation.
